pelicula.actor: Owen Wilson, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman
pelicula.sinopsis: Lightning McQueen, a rookie and selfish race car, discovers the importance of friendship and humility when he gets stuck in Radiator Springs.

pelicula.actor: Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Jo
pelicula.sinopsis: A cunning and unscrupulous unemployed family, the Kims, infiltrates the life of the wealthy and glamorous Park family, intertwining destinies that lead to unexpected consequences.

pelicula.actor: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Paul Reiser
pelicula.sinopsis: A talented young drummer is under the tutelage of a demanding and perfectionist teacher who pushes him to the limits of his abilities and sanity.

pelicula.actor: Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Octavia Spencer
pelicula.sinopsis: In the Cold War era, a mute woman works in a high-security laboratory and forms a unique bond with a captive aquatic creature.

pelicula.actor: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang
pelicula.sinopsis: Four teachers decide to experiment by maintaining a constant level of alcohol in their systems throughout the day to improve their lives. However, they soon realize it can spiral out of control.

pelicula.actor: Frances McDormand, David Strathairn, Linda May
pelicula.sinopsis: A woman, after the economic collapse of a company in a rural town, becomes a nomad in the American West, exploring life outside conventional society while traveling in a camper van.

pelicula.actor: Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Oscar Isaac
pelicula.sinopsis: In the distant future, Paul Atreides, a young noble of the Atreides family, is destined to rule the desert planet Arrakis, the only known source of the most valuable spice in the universe.

pelicula.actor: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton
pelicula.sinopsis: A musician who has lost his passion for life is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of a child's soul learning about itself.

pelicula.actor: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, John Legend
pelicula.sinopsis: In Los Angeles, a jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams and facing the challenges of artistic life.

pelicula.actor: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
pelicula.sinopsis: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, specializes in extracting valuable secrets from people's dreams. Now, he faces the opposite task: implanting an idea in someone else's mind.
